page.title: 06TRAFFIC AT LITTLE MILL
page.content: The A472 is a very busy single carriageway from Pontypool to Usk. Lorries, buses and cars travel to a nearby Defence Establishment and it is also used as a link road to the A4042. The effect of the heavy traffic upon the infrastructure of this narrow road is causing concern.There is a speed limit of 40m.p.h.through the built_up area, but this certainly does not deter some drivers from exceeding the limit. The public bus service has been drastically curtailled to three buses per day with returns.The local education authority provide private buses for transporting children to several primary and secondary schools in adjoining villages and towns.
